name: Friends not found
description:
A small robot is looking for his friends that got their batteries drained in an accident, beware of the bad ones that want to steal your energy.

We are planning to fix and add all the stuff we hadn't the time to integrate before the deadline!

Please give us a lot of feedback to improve :)

Small game with procedurally generated levels

- Tutorial : level with only friendly robots;

- Easy: small map;

- Nightmare : huge map.

The  amazing DreamTeam that worked on this project:

  • Florencia Mariana Orosco Bonelli
